00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_gc)
00032 
00033 
00039 /*..........................................................................*/
00040 void QF_gc(QEvent const *e) {
00041     if (EVT_POOL_ID(e) != (uint8_t)0) {           /* is it a dynamic event? */
00042         QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00043         QF_INT_LOCK_();
00044 
00045         if (EVT_REF_CTR(e) > (uint8_t)1) {      /* isn't this the last ref? */
00046             EVT_DEC_REF_CTR(e);                /* decrement the ref counter */
00047 
00048             QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_GC_ATTEMPT, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00049                 QS_TIME_();                                    /* timestamp */
00050                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                 /* the signal of the event */
00051                 QS_U8_(EVT_POOL_ID(e));         /* the pool Id of the event */
00052                 QS_U8_(EVT_REF_CTR(e));       /* the ref count of the event */
00053             QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00054 
00055             QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00056         }
00057         else {      /* this is the last reference to this event, recycle it */
00058                                                       /* cannot wrap around */
00059             uint8_t idx = (uint8_t)(EVT_POOL_ID(e) - 1);
00060 
00061             QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_GC, (void *)0, (void *)0)
00062                 QS_TIME_();                                    /* timestamp */
00063                 QS_SIG_(e->sig);                 /* the signal of the event */
00064                 QS_U8_(EVT_POOL_ID(e));         /* the pool Id of the event */
00065                 QS_U8_(EVT_REF_CTR(e));       /* the ref count of the event */
00066             QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00067 
00068             QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00069 
00070             Q_ASSERT(idx < QF_maxPool_);
00071 
00072             /*lint -e1773                        Attempt to cast away const */
00073             QF_EPOOL_PUT_(QF_pool_[idx], (QEvent *)e);/* cast 'const' away, */
00074                           /* which is legitimate, because it's a pool event */
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }
